pr_title: the sql injection not secure was replaced by 'getMetaData'

timeline.message: the sql injection not secure was replaced by 'getMetaData'

timeline.bodyText:
doIsTablePresent() should not be public. It is there to enable subclasses to provide an alternative implementation for isTablePresent, if the generic implementation does not work for them.
Please convert the original implementation using a literal query to a query using parameters.
Please also remove the implementation of of isTablePresent(), (that call doIsTablePresent()) from H2DbmsSupport, MsSqlServerDbmsSupport and OracleDbmsSupport, so that they will use the default using getMetaData()
timeline.author: gvanbrakel

timeline.bodyText: Please have a look at the original code. You should use isAfterLast() instead of next()
timeline.author: gvanbrakel

timeline.message: rs.next by was replaced by rs.isAfterLast

timeline.bodyText:
doIsTableColumnPresent() should not call isColumnPresent(), because it is meant to provide a way to override isColumnPresent() in descender classes, like OracleDbmsSupport, H2DbmsSupport, MsSqlServerDbmsSupport.
In those classes it is currently used to override isColumntPresent().
Please:

remove the implementations of doIsTableColumnPresent in OracleDbmsSupport, H2DbmsSupport and MsSqlServerDbmsSupport, to enable that they use the standard Jdbc solution.
implement doIsTableColumnPresent with the same queries, but then with placeholders ('?') and parameters instead of
literals.

Please run also iaf-test to see that your code runs correctly in a Frank application
